The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your party venue and decorations.

Purchase Lace Table Runner
Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Chair sashes play a very important role in heightening the elegance and sophistication of any event's decor. They add color, dimension, and texture to ordinary banquet chairs, which is where your guests will spend a considerable part of the evening. Our classical lace chair sashes bring that vintage touch to your party settings that many couples seek to achieve, with a homey feel and relaxed mood, your guests will surely have the best time celebrating your special day with you. The high quality lace has intricately been fashioned to give that sheer delicate-looking texture to the chair sashes that will exude oodles of elegance and imperial sophistication to your wedding decor. Besides being a classy and swish choice for weddings and parties, these chair sashes fit perfectly to those jolly moments at home with friends that you rejoice while relishing your home baked delights and cherishing those heart to heart talks with your close ones!

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • Measurement: 6" wide x 108" long
  • Lace style Material: Polyester
  • How to Care: Dry clean only.
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: 5 Pack | 22" x 78" Mauve DIY Premium Designer Chiffon Chair Sashes
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 8.99

[About]

  • Quantity: 5 Sashes
  • Material: Chiffon
  • Color: Mauve
  • Size: 22" wide x 78" long
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
  • Buy Sash Buckles

[Information]

Our soft Chiffon Sashes are perhaps one of our most exquisite sash options! Sheer soft flowing feel and lightweight luxurious look of this sash adds the perfect delicate elegance touch to any event! Made from premium quality chiffon, the dreamlike draping effect of these sashes will transform your simple party chairs into royal seats. Besides having seamless stylish appearance, these sashes are also durable enough to continue accentuating your party chairs for many years with the same flawless flair.

Easy to shape and work with, chiffon fabric gives plenty of options to adorn your party or banquet chairs; pair with our Satin or Spandex Chair Belts and Covers, embellish with our Jeweled Sash Clips and Pins, or add our Sash Flowers for a refreshing feel. If you wish to make your event simply outshine all the rest, we recommend our favorite “weaved” style that can be created by interlacing multiple chiffon sashes on a Chiavari chair!

Additional Information:

  • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use dryer
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Soft, Smooth, and Silky

Premium quality chiffon fabric is stylishly fashioned in classy curly style to craft these pretty sashes. The soft, smooth, and silky chiffon material coupled with chic curly design will instantly heighten the elegance of your plain and lackluster banquet or wedding chairs. Pair these appealing beauties with matching color chair covers and caps to create a charismatic coherence, or create a perfectly contrastive festive mood by coordinating these with vibrant hued satin or polyester chair covers.

Premium Chiffon Fabric

Like a majestic flow of a paradise fountain, these gorgeous chiffon sashes also cascade gorgeously, creating a totally dramatic and exotic appearance for your guests to behold and marvel at. Premium quality chiffon fabric is stylishly fashioned in classy curly style to craft these pretty sashes.

Multi-Use

The soft, smooth, and silky chiffon material coupled with chic curly design will instantly heighten the elegance of your plain and lackluster banquet or wedding chairs. entry.title: 5 Pack | Linen Chair Sashes, Slubby Textured Wrinkle Resistant Sashes - Blush | Rose Gold
entry.summary:

Quantity: 5 pcs
Material: Faux Linen
Color: Blush | Rose Gold
Length: 108" long
Width: 6" wide
GSM: ﻿160
Serged edges for an exquisite look
These High Quality sashes are made from fine polyester yarn with beautiful, textured weaves.
Features: Slubby Texture, Wrinkle Resistant, Anti-Shrink, Soft and supple
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information] 

    Faux Linen Chair Sashes

    Combining the stylish slubby texture with soft and supple fabric, our Faux Linen Chair Sashes will add a chic country charm to your party or wedding chairs. Crafted from high quality super fine polyester yarns, the textured weaved design of these sashes will surely add a dash of whimsy to any plain party or banquet chairs.

    Seamless Finish & Serged Edges

    Featuring seamless finish and serged edges, our soft and textured Chair Sashes are completely wrinkle resistant. Thus, making your party setting procedure a breeze. Simply swathe around your plain banquet or folding chairs, or pair with plush chair covers and chair skirts for an added flair. Adorn with our sash pins, succulents, or flower heads for a truly mesmeric presentation.

    Durable and Reusable

    Durable and reusable, these sturdy chair sashes are anti-shrink and wrinkle free, this makes them ideal to be used time and time again to spruce your merry moments up. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, showers, holiday parties, family dinners, and corporate events, these soft and supple sashes will give your plain chairs a sophisticated twist.


    Additional Information:

    • Fabric: Faux Linen
    • Serged Width: 5mm
    • Fabric Care: Machine wash with cold water with mild detergent. For best results air dry.
    • Cannot put in Dryer. Air Dry ONLY
    • Each order is for 5 sashes. Sashes are shipped untied.
    • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Better just got BEST! Yes, our special combo pack of premium quality soft flowing designer chiffon sashes and chic curly chiffon sashes will impart that contemporary elegance to your party and banquet chairs that no one has beheld before! Perfect for Chiavari Chairs, Banquet Chairs, Folding Chairs, and Party Chairs, this dazzling duo will create an eye-catching chair accent. Let this classy pair transform your plain and drab party chairs into royal seats of cascading beauty. Use in conjunction with our Chiffon Chair Covers, Tablecloths, Table Runners, Backdrop Drapes, and Roof Panels to complete your party’s royal look!
